https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gMppKd5bHuc68674vJVEod7HQRw.jpg Set in Genoa, the film concerns the financial struggles and emotional strain that occur after Michele loses his job. He and his wife Elsa are forced to give up their affluent lifestyle and cope with the tensions of moving into a smaller home, finding new work, and making sacrifices. Days and Clouds
